data.text: @ndtv There is no shortage of vaccines!! Please be accurate in your representation

@ndtv This is damn interesting! Emergency vaccine vs regular vaccine, 2 years and vaccines are still sold with the tag "emergency", if it becomes regular and you see the side-effects, a patient can sue the vaccine manufacturer but this game of 'emergency vaccine' is still played on!
@ndtv Is NDTV on schedule target on its objective to criticize the present government?
